name: IgnorePointer
desc: A widget that is invisible during hit testing.

fields.name: ignoring
fields.desc: Whether this widget is ignored during hit testing.

fields.name: ignoringSemantics
fields.desc: Whether the semantics of this widget is ignored when compiling the semantics subtree.

nodes.name: Basic Usage of IgnorePointer
desc: As shown below, when the Switch is selected, ignoring is true, and the button event will be locked and cannot be clicked.
